channel.title: Desmond Choy's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Desmond Choy's Blog

item.title: Oil and Gas Sector 2019 (Part I)
item.description: While preparing for an internal sector presentation, I decided to experiment with R to see if I could replicate the results generated by BBG and customize it further to shed more insight. The learning curve was steep but, on hindsight, I benefitted tremendously from the following: A great opportunity to practise all aspects of Data Science. From Importing, to Tidying, to Exploratory Data Analysis, to my first ever R Markdown document!

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
